subject: p14841168
History: With ESRD on dialysis, DM, who presents with abdominal pain. Rule out pneumonia.
Findings: Compared to the prior radiograph, lung volumes remain low. Streaky opacity in the left lung base is likely atelectasis, and similar to the prior radiograph. No focal opacity identified at the left lung base on concurrent CT. Moderate cardiomegaly is unchanged. The mediastinal and hilar contours are stable. No pneumothorax is identified.
Impression: No focal consolidation concerning for pneumonia.
